languages.text: The holder gets to reload a free melta-gun once per round. The first shot in battle from the melta is not included in the attack limit.

traits.locale_text: The holder gets to reload a free melta-gun once per round. The first shot in battle from the melta is not included in the attack limit.

languages.text: The wearer's first melta weapon reload in a round costs 0 AP. The wearer's first melta weapon attack in combat does not count toward the attack limit per turn.
